post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Senior C#, Java Developers


AN UNNAMED COMPANY


Mississauga, ON, CANADA; Toronto, ON, CANADA; Vaughan, ON, CANADA; Woodbridge, ON, CANADA


Posted Jul 27, 2010



(We are looking for both Senior level C# and JAVA Developers)
C# DEVELOPER:
We are looking for one Senior C# developer to work with the front end of a web based game application providing services to our client. The responsibilities include but are not limited to:
analysis, design, documentation, programming, testing and code reviews.

REQUIREMENTS
. 5+ years experience in C# Software Development
. Experience creating applications using C#, ASP.NET, Web Services, XML and
   any database system (preferably, postgres or mysql)
. Creative Problem Solving Skills, strong written and verbal communication skills
. Multithreading programming skills and distributed programming knowledge
. Socket programming skills
. Strong client-server and SOA architecture knowledge
. Object serialization knowledge
. Extensive experience with OOP, A&D
. NUnit (or any other unit testing) experience
. SVN or CVS usage experience

The following will be considered as a plus:
. Unity3D experience.
. Experience with IIS server usage and configuration.
. Computer Science related degree.
. Any Java experience
. Linux admin and programming skills
Salary requirements:  $5000 to $6000/month; contract position for hire

JAVA DEVELOPER
We are looking for one Senior Java developer to work with messaging middleware software providing services to our client. The responsibilities include but are not limited to: analysis, design, documentation, programming, testing and code reviews.
REQUIREMENTS
·          5+ years experience in Java development
·          Verifiable experience in Hibernate or iBatis frameworks
·          Creative Problem Solving Skills, strong written and verbal communication skills
·          Multithreading programming skills and distributed programming knowledge
·          Socket programming skills
·          Strong client-server and SOA architecture knowledge
·          Object serialization knowledge
·          Extensive experience with OOP,A&D
·          JUnit experience
·          Eclipse, SVN and Maven usage experience
The following will be considered as a plus:
·         Spring framework knowledge
·         Experience with Tomcat server usage and configuration.
·         Linux admin and programming skills
Salary requirements:  $5000 to $6000/month; contract position for hire
Apply Online
post.title: Senior C#, Java Developers
